title: Lolea No 1 Red Sangria Spain
raw_ec_shortdesc: This sweet and vibrant Sangria combines a high-quality, hearty red wine made from Cabernet Sauvignon and Tempranillo with fresh Mediterranean citrus and a hint of cinnamon. Ready to pour and bursting with tantalizing aromas of fresh, dark cherry and spice, it is the perfect party companion.
raw_lcbo_tastingnotes: This sweet and vibrant Sangria combines a high-quality, hearty red wine made from Cabernet Sauvignon and Tempranillo with fresh Mediterranean citrus and a hint of cinnamon. Ready to pour and bursting with tantalizing aromas of fresh, dark cherry and spice, it is the perfect party companion.
